name: Twaddle Paddle
description:
A colorful experience that sticks to the basics of brick breaker games and makes the most of it.

This game is intended as a bag of candies, giving you lots of short levels packed with intense action.

The "retro modern" looks of the game matches perfectly a gameplay filled with subtle improvements that makes the old feel more lively than ever

It also has a kids mode that I developed with my 5 years old

As the only person behind this project, I thank you deeply
